value.title: StarCraft 2: Scarlett's PROTOSS Offrace?! (Scarlett vs PiG)
value.excerpt: This game of StarCraft 2 is from a recent ESL Open Cup. In this match we watch Scarlett pick up the Protoss pieces versus PiG who plays as Zerg.
